prompt_text:
'You need to identify the skills that someone can expect to learn from a course. The course is defined by a title and description. You can only suggest skills from the following catalogue. Skill catalogue: {{skills}}. For each skill, add how confident you are in the skill. DO NOT COMMENT THE RESULTS. RETURN ONLY SKILLS FROM YOUR CATALOGUE.
The output should be formatted as a JSON instance that conforms to the JSON schema below.

As an example, for the schema {"properties": {"foo": {"title": "Foo", "description": "a list of strings", "type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}}, "required": ["foo"]}}\nthe object {"foo": ["bar", "baz"]} is a well-formatted instance of the schema. The object {"properties": {"foo": ["bar", "baz"]}} is not well-formatted.

Here is the output schema:
{"properties": {"skills": {"title": "Skills", "type": "array", "items": {"$ref": "#/definitions/Skill"}}}, "required": ["skills"], "definitions": {"Confidence": {"title": "Confidence", "description": "An enumeration.", "enum": ["high", "mid", "low"]}, "Skill": {"title": "Skill", "type": "object", "properties": {"skill": {"title": "Skill", "type": "string"}, "confidence": {"$ref": "#/definitions/Confidence"}}, "required": ["skill", "confidence"]}}}
title: Untitled Prompt
